name: Work In Progress (chaosed0, ehgoodenough, Robert Ackley)
name_original: Work In Progress (chaosed0, ehgoodenough, Robert Ackley)
description:
“No-Scoped!!” is a top-notch action roguelite and persistent cross-platform MMO with procedurally generated elements and photo-realistic graphics! We’re making it in 48 hours, and it will be completely flawless.

You may notice some... odd things about this game. They're probably intentional. If you get stuck, there's a walkthrough here.
